Package game

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Buu
    this is the enemy boss class that extends walker and implements StepListener
    BuuShot
    this class is for the bullet of my enemy boss
    BuuShotHit
    this is for the collision for the shooting of the boss
    CellJr
    making enemy that extends walker
    CellJrHit
    this detects when the enemy is hit by the main characters shot
    Controller
    creating the controller to control the main character
    ControlPanel  
    DragonBall
    collectible object class that extends dynamic body
    DragonBallHit
    class for detecting if the dragon ball is hit by the characters shot
    Game
    The computer game.
    GameLevel
    this creates the general GameLevel that is shared by all the other levels
    GiveFocus
    A mouse listener that gives the keyboard focus to a specified component.
    Goku
    class that creates the main character and extends walker
    GokuHit
    class for when the main character is hit by the boss bullet which implements CollisionListener
    Level1
    this is my Level1 that extends the abstract GameLevel
    Level2
    this is my Level2 that extends the abstract GameLevel
    Level3
    this is my Level3 that extends the abstract GameLevel
    Level4
    this is my Level4 that extends the abstract GameLevel
    Level5
    this is my Level5 that extends the abstract GameLevel
    MoveLeftState
    this is the for the FSM for my boss that makes him move left which extends the FSMState
    MoveRightState
    this is the for the FSM for my boss that makes him move right which extends the FSMState
    MyView
    this class allows me to put in a background.
    Pickup
    this class allows my main character to pick up and collide with objects
    Portal
    this class creates the portal for my game which allows players to advance to the next level, extends StaticBody
    PortalListener
    this class detects collisions with my portal extends CollisionListener
    Saibaman
    making enemy that extends walker
    SaibamanHit
    this detects when the enemy is hit by the main characters shot
    SenzuBean
    collectible object class that extends dynamic body
    Shoot
    this class is for the bullet of my main character
    ShotHit
    this is for the collision for the shooting of the main character
    StandStillState
    this is the for the FSM for my boss that makes him stand still which extends the FSMState
    Tracker
    Pan the view to follow a particular body.
